attributes.action: Remove student income calculated by universal credit on post graduate study
attributes.background: To remove PG loans as income on universal credit claims. PG loan fees are in excess of £13000 with a student finance loan of £10609 this doesn't cover the fees. This loan is classed as income deducting the entire entitlement from UC for single parents meaning they can't afford childcare or housing.
